allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: serialize page processing to prevent race condition

Pages were being processed concurrently due to async event handlers,
causing only the first card to be saved when the complete event fired
and reset state before other handlers finished.

- Add processingQueue to chain page processing sequentially
- Wait for queue to drain before resetting state on complete/error
- Adjust default color settings \(contrast -10, saturation 0.9\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
